## GameObject.render() method

Builds a view of this object from the perspective of a player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract render(ctx: RenderContext): IView;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ctx | [RenderContext](./bge-core.rendercontext.md) | Information about where the object is in the scene, and who's viewing it. |

**Returns:**

[IView](./bge-core.iview.md)
